content: blueOwl Provider Memo (2023-12-01): Network update for Cedar Bluff area addresses increased pre-authorization scrutiny for patellar procedures. New requirements implemented for documentation of failed conservative treatments, particularly in patients under 35 showing hypermobility traits. Review impacts policies 774-32GY and 881-45QJ. Contact provider liaison Trent McCullough (tmccullough@blueowl.net) with questions.
